content.raw:
On "default" the max speed is caped to 0.4. But we were hoping to put in higher in the PR updating the navigation parameters.
We can also cap the acceleration of the diff drive controller directly in URDF but I'd rather avoid it as it cannot be overriden by users without modifying the URDF.

Either way, if you get same or better behavior with this PR let's merge it :+1:
content.html:
On "default" the max speed is caped to 0.4. But we were hoping to put in higher in the PR updating the navigation parameters. We can also cap the acceleration of the diff drive controller directly in URDF but I'd rather avoid it as it cannot be overriden by users without modifying the URDF.

Either way, if you get same or better behavior with this PR let's merge it :+1:
